name: MindCrew Technologies
description:
Founded in 2011, MindCrew Technologies is a leading technology solutions provider specializing in web, mobile and technology services. From past 7 years , MindCrew has been innovation partner for world’s small and medium enterprises and pioneering start-ups. 

With reach across five continents, we provides enterprise solutions , best practice offerings, strategic application development , IT consulting services. We craft custom solutions in web, mobile, cloud and IOT s using rapid agile and lean engineering methods and productivity frameworks. 
MindCrew's comprehensive range of digital and technology services and solutions enables its customers to achieve new thresholds of business performance. Our trend-setting ways of making software ensures faster time to market, product quality, lower risk and transparency. 
For more information keep visiting www.mindcrewtech.com or email us at mehul.nahar@mindcrewtech.com
